interpretation: The "man supervillain" emoji represents someone who seeks power and control through deceitful means. This card may indicate a person or situation in your life that is working against you, manipulating the circumstances to their advantage. Be cautious of those who seem too good to be true or who offer you deals that seem too easy. They may have ulterior motives that could harm you in the end. On the other hand, this card could also represent your own inner supervillain, reminding you to be mindful of your own actions and motivations. Are you using your own power and influence for good, or are you becoming the very thing you fear? Take a step back and assess your intentions before moving forward. Keywords associated with this card include: manipulation, deceit, power, control, caution, and self-reflection.
